Caption:
The image is a certificate of film certification from the Central Board of Film Certification in India, certifying a movie under the Universal category with a duration of 135.00 minutes and a rated film. It is dated November 12, 2015.

The certificate is in Hindi and English, and the certificate number is DIL/1/19582/2015-MUM. The producer of the film is Bhanjali Productions India, and the chairman's signature is visible at the bottom right corner. The background of the certificate is a gray color.<|eot_id|>
